resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Proves that this sheet of parchment was reused by the baillif scribe. It is indeed a palimpseste on which the former writings have been erased. Thanks to the this contrast filter, we can guess some paragraphs of this former document.
resource.chars: Proves that this sheet of parchment was reused by the baillif scribe. It is indeed a palimpseste on which the former writings have been erased. Thanks to the this contrast filter, we can guess some paragraphs of this former document.
